text: 17.28: Kor 1.17; Ta 1.12; Hi 1.3‘Ana vhɨra nduara bɨɨŋbɨɨn nza ndɨɨim, nza ki. Ana nduara ŋkasŋkar nza ndɨɨim, nza rui.’ Kha kameŋ nden tɨvi kaŋgi gumgi mbari, mbe vhɨra ne nzuai. Mbe khaŋ nzuai, ‘Nza vhɨra, ana tari ma.’ 17.28 Ves 18 khaŋ muuŋgi tɨva muuŋgi, Por Zudaiŋ tɨvi kaŋgi gumgi fhum suaŋgi kamenira, mbe phorga nzuai. Ana maaŋ muuŋgirga, mbe tuituigip ana nzuai buni kaŋgirga.
